name: Free Kick Football - Version PC
description:
Free Kick Football is a very fun free kick game.
You have 10 tries, score the most goals to do the best score.
Send your score and look where you placed in the world ranking.
Who will be the best free-kick hitter?
It's up to you!

***Game Features***

- Adrenaline rush guaranteed
- Fun Music
- Experience unique gameplay
- Graphics and Animations Fun
- Extremely addictive
